attributes.action: return Britains Railways to the public sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The privatisation of British Rail by the last governemnt, has proven to be a costly mistake. It now costs three times as much to run the railways than it did under the state owned British Rail - much of it going straight into shareholders pockets, instead of improving the railways. This governemnt should return the railways to the public sector, as it promised to do in opposition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
